title: Champ gone
body: So I went into my collection today I saw a strange thing. It said Camille was locked, so I checked the store and she is available to buy. Has anyone else ever had a champ just deleted from their roster?

replies.body: Hey, I checked this out for you and it looks like Camille was refunded yesterday.  You got the currency back so you can grab her again if you'd like her in your pool.  You can hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as well about your refund token, though I can't make any guarantees on restoring it.

Are you sure she was apart of your line-up? Do you have any kind of screenshot that you have to prove you had her?

Maybe Riot can help you with that.
I have a mastery chest for her, which you only can get if you own the champ
